{"step_by_step_thinking": "The permanent maxillary first molar typically has three roots: the mesiobuccal, distobuccal, and palatal. The mesiofacial root refers to the mesiobuccal root. Therefore, to gain access to the Mesiofacial root of the permanent maxillary first molar, the root canal instrument should be placed from the mesiobuccal direction.", "answer_choice": "A. From the mesiobuccal"}
